metadata.name: Homuncula/Hermes_theNEW_Profet
metadata.description:
She is Homuncula a Being who reincarnates the power of Hermes Trimesgistro. Hermes is a universal energy associated with the power of the mind, where it through thoughts is the creator of the universe that surrounds us. For the students of Gnosticism, Hermes was named as the first alchemist, for the Greeks he was known as Thoth and in astrology this energy is ruled by the great wise star, Mercury This series of scenes created in Unreal Engine will show the succession of the development of a video game to then be encrypted as NFTs. The original concept of it is that the player discovers important secrets of the history of the Humanity, unlock puzzles, and explore an introspective world where fractals and sacred geometry guide you to higher dimensions.

Note: Homucula has in her hand The Caduceo, the symbology of Hermes
